question: Choose the wrong statements about Ultima Thule. 1.Ultima Thule is located in the Kuiper belt beyond the orbit of Uranus. 2.Ultima Thule belongs to a class of Kuiper belt objects called the “hot classicals”.
explanation: Ultima Thule is located in the Kuiper belt in the outermost regions of the Solar System, beyond the orbit of Neptune. Ultima Thule belongs to a class of Kuiper belt objects called the “cold classicals”, which have nearly circular orbits with low inclinations to the solar plane.
